Package org.gridlab.gat.net

This package contains the classes and interfaces which are used for networking.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
RemoteException  
 

Package org.gridlab.gat.net Description

This package contains the classes and interfaces which are used for networking. Currently the only class in this package is the Location class. An instance of the class Location represents the location of an abstract or physical resource and is used to specify such.
